section.title: How do you write Jmol?
section.p: Please do not write it any other way ... to avoid confusion with other projects ... keep reading ...

section.title: Is there another JMol?
section.p: Yes, there is a project called JMol ... but not Jmol ... note the difference in spelling.

Will York wrote the JMol viewer at the Complex Carbohydrate Research Center, University of Georgia, USA. The home page is at
http://www.ccrc.uga.edu/~will/jmol/jmol.html

section.title: How do I reference Jmol in published papers?
section.p: Both on the web and in published papers you should reference Jmol by its web site ... www.jmol.org
